features.featureTitle: Add new generated logo image assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` that match the provided design: modern circular badge for brand text “HND” with a red outer circular border, white inner background, a friendly minimal cartoon chef (smiling) holding a pizza tray, wearing a chef hat and scarf; the “HND” text must be bold, modern, rounded, and use red and green; the asset must be clean, minimal, professional, high-resolution, vector-style, transparent background, with no watermark, blur, or extra text.

Update the site UI to use the new HND badge logo asset for all current logo placements (header logo and hero logo), replacing the existing `/assets/generated/hnd-logo-restaurant-transparent.dim_512x512.png` references.
Add favicon configuration in `frontend/index.html` to use the new favicon asset so browsers display the HND badge in the tab icon.
